title: League Client is down NA East?
body:
Me and 3 other friends are all randomly getting disconnected from the client,  and now I am currently unable to login, the service status says everything is fine but we all beg to differ. please look into this Rito, thanks

Edit: Everyone on my friends list except 1 is now offline...

Second Edit: As of 2:00 PM EST I haven't had any more issues

replies.body: Just had the same error. Didn't disconnect me from the game, but just the client. Loot screen is also delayed. perhaps maintenance?

We've had a few issues with some ghost games throughout the day, but as far as server status it seems like everything has been alright today. Have you and your friends been having any problems since then?

there is only one league server in NA there are no east and west, and i have been on most of the day, eastern area aswell, however i have been experiencing Abnormal Ping and latencey issues since 4 P.M. EST
